text:
THE ARKANSAS STATE TEACHERS COLLEGE
CONWAY, ARKANSAS
January 20, 1965
N.A.E.B.C.
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Gentlemen:
The Arkansas ETV activity is to be located on the campus of
this institution.
This library hopes to augment as fully as possible its resources
in the field of educational television. From information receiv¬
ed from TJrbana we plan to order back issues of the NAEB Journal.
The purpose of this inquiry is to ask whether you would recom¬
mend an organizational membership for our library and if so,
what the annual cost would be?
Any additional advice and/or assistance you can and will furnish
us will be greatly appreciated.
LBSiph
“THE FRIENDLIEST COLLEGE IN ARKANSAS”
